languages.text: After using Run and Gun, the wearer gains +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} when in cover for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: 使用奔袭射击之后，装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}掩体效果{/g}提高15%，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: ラン＆ガンの使用後、着用者は1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}だけカバーの最中に+15%の{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}カバー効率{/g}を得る。
languages.original_text: After using Run and Gun, the wearer gains +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} when in cover for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: ショット・オン・ランの使用後、着用者は1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}だけカバーの最中に15％の{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}カバー効率{/g}を得る。

languages.text: Tras usar Disparo a la carrera, el portador gana +15 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}eficacia de cobertura{/g} mientras esté a cubierto durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text: After using Run and Gun, the wearer gains +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} when in cover for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Tras usar Disparo a la carrera, el portador gana +15 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}eficacia de cobertura{/g} mientras esté a cubierto durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

languages.text: Nach dem Einsatz von Laufen und ballern erhält der Träger +15 % auf {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckungseffizienz{/g}, wenn er sich 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang in Deckung befunden hat.
languages.original_text: After using Run and Gun, the wearer gains +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} when in cover for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Nach der Nutzung von Auf der Flucht erschossen erlangt der Träger +15 % auf {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckungseffizienz{/g}, wenn er sich 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang in Deckung befunden hat.

languages.text: После применения Стрельбы на бегу при нахождении в {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}укрытии{/g} персонаж получает +15% к его эффективности на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
languages.original_text: After using Shot on the Run, the wearer gains +15% {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}cover efficiency{/g} when in cover for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: После применения Стрельбы на бегу при нахождении в укрытии персонаж получает +15% к его {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}эффективности{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
После применения Стрельбы на бегу при нахождении в укрытии персонаж получает +15% к его {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}эффективности{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

languages.text: Après avoir eu recours à Tir à la volée, l'utilisateur bénéficie pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} de +15 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}efficacité de couverture{/g} lorsqu'il est à couvert.

traits.locale_text: Après avoir eu recours à Tir en Courant, l'utilisateur bénéficie pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} de +15 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}efficacité de couverture{/g} lorsqu'il est à couvert.

languages.text: Takan kişi, Fırla ve Mıhla kullandıktan sonra siperdeyken +%15 {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}siper etkililiği{/g} kazanır. Bu etki, 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.
